data.name: ReadCaseCaseRole
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE from CKT_CASE_ROLE where (CAS_NUMBER = @casNumber) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) order by END_DATE desc

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb
